title: Until where?
body:
Up until what ELO can someone easily:
1- Solo carry 4 incompetent players?
2- Duo carry 3 incompetent players?
3- Split push without joining a single team fight?
4- Destroy unsuspecting victims with Evelynn?
5- Land easy game-winning hooks with Blitzcrank?

The main question is, at which ELO do people start being able to prevent these things? Currently at gold, people still don't know how to deal with these things.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Pured,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EjnLqVL2,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-22T01:23:11.521+0000)
>
> The main question is, at which ELO do people start being able to prevent these things? Currently at gold, people still don't know how to deal with these things.

[Diamond2+](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R8BtklaSWl0)
You'll never be able to prevent anything that your teammates do in every ELO , stop focusing on your team and start focusing on yourself. Make yourself more consistent and you will climb.
